skins.shipDescription: Independence-class light aircraft carrier C Independence, Hull Number CVL-22.
skins.selfIntroduction: I was initially to be the fifth Cleveland-class cruiser, but got remodeled into a light aircraft carrier due to the skyrocketing need for additional carriers. Thanks to the new capabilities this gave me, I flourished in battle and achieved victory together with my allies.
skins.acquisition: I'm Independence, light carrier. Don't worry about that "light" part, and just hand those missions over to me.
skins.login: Today's training and routine missions are progressing smoothly, Commander. You can rest easy.
skins.details: I'm prepared to battle at nighttime, if necessary.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Should I call Cleveland... "Cleve"? Or do I keep it simple?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I will take on that task you assigned me with the highest priority, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm apparently terrible at reading between the lines... So please, Commander: whenever you have something to say, tell it to me straight.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Go to the Admiralty and explain yourself. Right now.

skins.shipDescription: So this is my new school, huh? Hmm... gotta put my stuff down first before checking in with the teacher.
skins.acquisition: So this is my new school, huh? Hmm... gotta put my stuff down first before checking in with the teacher.
skins.login: Living in a dorm means I don't have to worry about being late for school.
skins.details: Yeah, it should be fine to leave my pet in the dorm... I think?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Join a club? Maybe I should... Hmm... Actually, I'm good.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Both studies and missions require your full, undivided attention.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Ugh... This collar is too tight... Why are you staring, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you not get what this paragraph means? Let me have a look.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ...Go to the staff room and explain yourself.

skins.shipDescription: Hmm... Isn't this one a bit too garish? Mm... What if we pair it with a necklace or some sort of purse? ...Commander, your thoughts? C'mon, don't just stare at me, give me something to work with here...
